tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am Shyamala U, 69 yr old woman who had a fall 4 months back. I had severe back pain and found it difficult to get up from bed and do other regular activities. An orthopedic doctor I consulted diagnosied that my spine had a compression fracture and advised that I wear a brace. But there was no relief from my pain. My daughtet after online search zeroed in on Dr. Karunakaran. He is a down to earth person. He listened patiently when I explained my difficulties due to the pain. His kind and encouraging words gave me the courage to go through D11 to L1 percutaneous pedicle screw fixation done under GA which was decided after a series of tests, x rays and scans. 
After the surgery on 17th Aug 2021 his advices and approach were extraordinary to me. His team of doctors is also excellent.
Post surgery I felt immense relief from pain within a couple of days.
So I strongly recommend Dr. Karunakaran for any spine related problems and one can rest assured of positive outcome within a short period.

I recently undergone a  ACDF Surgery , knowing that you are my doctor, I feel safe. My trust and confidence are always with you. My heartfelt thanks to you doctor. Because God could not be everywhere he made sure that we have doctors like you who have the gift of healing mankind. Your care,kindness and comforting treatment gives us positive vibes to us . Your an extraordinary  human being....I believe that you are one of the best doctors in the world . Thank you once again ðŸ˜ŠðŸ˜Š

I had been to hospital and it was for health issue. Doctor was calm and he spoke gently. I can recommend doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. Scanning was done. I had spinal related issue. There was some waiting time in the hospital as doctor was attending surgery when I went. I am good and comfortable now. Hospitality was good.

He is a very good person *** ** *** ***** * *** ** ******* ****** *** *** ********** We trust him 100%. Nice person with a good helping attitude, I have 10-15 years of good experience with him so have a lot of trust in him and he gives good time to check patients and clear all problems. 200% ** ** * **** ******* I would rate him 10 out 10 and we have known him for a long time, he works exactly on the problematic areas. Definitely would like to recommend this doctor to my family and friends.

Note: "Before writing this review am telling to you all am not much familiar with English language so just convey my message as much as I know in this any grammar and polite mistake please forgive..
About doctor: He didn't explain properly what is the issue and solutions **** ** ******* **** ***** **** *********** ***** ******* ***** he route to another doctor. **** ****** ** **** *********** **** *** **** ****** **** 
Am taken xray but thats too normal after that prescribed medicine.. till now am not get to know what is the issue by their experience

I had been to the doctor as I was suffering from back pain. The doctor was very friendly and supportive. Only medication was done. I had done an X-ray, MRI before. The doctor examined and did medication. Later I was able to see improvements after treatment. The waiting time was half an hour to 45 minutes. I am satisfied with the treatment given. I can recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Now I am feeling good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We got an excellent treatment from chief Dr. Karunakaran and his assistant Dr. Satish Balaji (ortho). The patient was abandoned by well known ortho hospital of Coimbatore. We heard about this hospital and came to check up. They diagnosed the patient and described the status of patient and told us how will go surgery . We have left and took some time to get surgery. After decided to go to surgery. We have arrived hospital and get admitted. Surgery was done and patient went to critical stage. We lost hope but the doctors didn't. They gave excellent treatment second by second and patient return to normal stage. I especially thanks to doctors and co ordinator Mr. Shiva. Keep going.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: He is not only a Doctor but also a good personalities having person. As his name indicate *KARUNA* means MERCY , DOYA in practical 100 percent he is appropriate for his name. I Fakhrul Islam from Assam Karimganj have gone to this Dr. by searching on online and booking on online also for consultation for my problem(spinal cord disorder). He suggested operation without any screw or plate although remainig four dr. s that we have gone to them before this doctor they said screw is compulsory for my operation. Now after a days of my operation 11/11/19 I am filling very fine. I cannot foget smilling face of Dr. karunakaran s sir. ever and naver. His behaviour is most friendly. Thanks a lot to sir.
Honestly  he is just a great person..He just respect the patients WHO come from abroad .  I just love This maan ðŸ–¤ðŸ–¤ðŸ–¤

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Very humble and patinant to hear the concerns.
Provided valuable advice, made us get rid of the patient fear
